quote: When you think a positive thought, you become positive.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Your thoughts make what happen in your life~You can turn anything negative into the positive~What you visualize can come true and you attract it to yourself
author: Pattimari Sheets-Diamond

quote: Only positive thoughts can inspire you to positive actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Thoughts Become Things... Choose The Good Ones!
author: Mike Dooley

quote: A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Remember, you are training your mind. You are either training to look for things to go wrong or you are training it to look for anything to go right. Train yourself to think only positive thoughts.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Don't let anyone's negative thoughts infect your beautiful mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
author: Donnie Yen

quote: But when nothing in your life happens in a positive frame, it is difficult to think positively and hope for the best.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: Thoughts are one of the most creative powers we have as human beings. If you hold the mantra in your mind that you are continually becoming more healthful and radiant, that is what you will become.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Remember, you are training your mind. You are either training it to look for things to go wrong or you are training it to look for things to go right. Train yourself to think only positive thoughts
author: Karon Waddell

quote: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Affirmations are our mental vitamins, providing the supplementary positive thoughts we need to balance the barrage of negative events and thoughts we experience daily.
author: Tia Walker,  The Inspired Caregiver: Finding Joy While Caring for Those You Love

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: The First Splendid Truth: To be happy, I need to think about feeling good, feeling bad, and feeling right, in an atmosphere of growth.
author: Gretchen Rubin,  The Happiness Project: Or Why I Spent a Year Trying to Sing in the Morning, Clean My Closets, Fight Right, Read Aristotle, and Generally Have More Fun

quote: Positivity is a connectivity between Heart-to-Heart and not Mind-to-Mind as that is only equal Profitability.
author: Anuj Somany

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: Its a mathematical fact that two negatives make a positive so even under adverse circumstances think positively.
author: Amit Abraham,  Personality Development Through Positive Thinking

quote: Last weekend a young man asked me how I remain so positive. “It seems all the negativity in the world doesn’t affect you,” he said. I had no more than a minute with the young man so I offered this: It’s all about where you choose to put your attention, and I choose to be happy.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.
author: Ron Jaworski

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: When we carry the thoughts of negativity and self-criticism, we inspire just what we don’t want: poor health and an unattractive physical body.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: If you have positive energy you will always attract positive outcomes.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Positive energy is attracted to positive energy.
author: Deborah Day

quote: To think is good. To obsess is bad.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor,  You Were Born Rich

quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: With no positivity, there is no hope; with no negativity, there is no improvement.
author: Criss Jami,  Healology

quote: Transform from being a fault-finder and blamer to a happiness-finder and appreciator. Positive emotions will increase in your life.
author: Maddy Malhotra,  How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Thoughts do more. Words to much. Actions do much more.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: Positive belief in yourself will give you the energy needed to conquer the world and this belief is the power behind all creation.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Your thoughts carry you wherever you want to go. Weak thoughts don’t have the energy to carry you far!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  Leaders' Watchwords

quote: Life is about balance. The good and the bad. The highs and the lows. The thing everyone should realize is that the key to happiness is being happy by yourself and for yourself. Happiness comes from within. You have the power to change your own mindset so that all the negative, horrible thoughts that try to invade your psyche are replaced with happy, positive, wonderful thoughts.
author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: Mix with positive-minded people as a means to tap into your unexploited potential.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Thoughts are as simple as the process…a message from the soul; conveyed through the heart; received in the mind
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen
